name: xslt_set_base
purpose: Set the base URI for all XSLT transformations

notes.description:
Please note that
file:// is needed in front of the path when using Windows.

changelog.change:
As of PHP 4.3.0, the default base URI is the directory of the executing script.
        In effect, it is the directory name value of the __FILE__
        constant. The default base URI is less predictable with older versions.
